defaultMessage: The proxy setup allows you to access Parity and all associated decentralized applications via memorable addresses.

Instead of accessing Parity via the IP address and port, you will be able to access it via the .parity subdomain, by visiting {homeProxy}. To setup subdomain-based routing, you need to add the relevant proxy entries to your browser,
To learn how to configure the proxy, instructions are provided for {windowsLink}, {macOSLink} or {ubuntuLink}.
